_sText: Unzip the map and put it in your map folder.

Bar Fight


Welcome @ Jacks new Map or in this case remake.
This Map was originally made by prototype
And can be found here: old Bar Fight
And please don't say its not a Minigame Map, blame prototype and not me.

Gameplay


As the game starts, T's make their way to the front of the bar (or go the basement route/roof route)
then break down the doors and try to kill all the CT's protecting the bar. (CT's spawn in the bar).
CT's have numerous places to camp, including knocking over tables and hiding behind them, hiding behind the bar counter, etc.
The game is over when all T's are dead or all CT's are dead, or the bomb blows up when planted.

Features


  • 3 Secrets
  • Alot of Spawns
  • 2 Bombplaces
  • Some Background sounds
  • Decals
  • and many more>

    • Something else?


    Visit our Minigame Server @ 37.157.252.236:27015
    And for sure visit our Forums @ hd-gamer.de
    Give me Feedback, comments and Rate :)
    And as I said DONT SAY ITS NOT AN MINIGAME MAP.
    I tried to make it more to be a minigame map.
    Thanks for Downloading :)

Hey everyone. I got the idea to make a fun CT vs. T rush/camping minigame map from smee tower so I decided to make a map that would have gameplay similar to that, but more fun, more camping spots, more excitement, and more alcohol.

The map consists of many spots:

-outside area where t's spawn
-a basement under the 1st floor of the bar
-1st floor of the bar
-2nd floor of the bar
-a roof above the 2nd floor of the bar

*There are tunnels that can go from the outside area to the 1st floor or to the basement. Also, there are 3 ladders that can go from the outside area to the roof.

As the game starts, T's make their way to the front of the bar (or go the basement route/roof route) then break down the doors and try to kill all the CT's protecting the bar. (CT's spawn in the bar). CT's have numerous places to camp, including knocking over tables and hiding behind them, hiding behind the bar counter, etc. The game is over when all T's are dead or all CT's are dead, or the bomb blows up when planted.

*There is a bomb site on the large table on the second floor.

********On the roof facing the T spawn, there is an invisible wall so CT's cannot shoot the T's as they approach the bar.

------------------------------------------

Have fun and please leave feedback!
This is a funny remake of mg_ambush by Keto

This map is my first map over the past year. An obstacle map made for steamgamers minigames server. This is a beta. We will have testruns and suggestions are always welcome. ***### Changelog*** **####Beta4:** - Other bitrates didnt work for the music on the server, so I used 44100. **####Beta3:** - Added more traps - Fall damage is disabled - Added 3 music files wich randomly play - Added funnier ways to end the map, asswell a minigame - The 'father gregory' trap has been deleted. - Changed the timing for several traps - Added more level detail - Two minecarts are filled (easier to jump out) - Also you wont be stuck anymore when you try to jump into the white - The vault should give more fps now - Nodrawed the entire map - Added a 6min timer to end the map - I made the iceskating part bigger, easier to start - The endroom and minigame have a 30sec kill timer - and more .. **####Beta2:** - Changed the moving doors in the sewers to lasers. - Custom files should be visible now. (If i missed one, please say so) - Made some smooth changes to other traps. - Respawn time is now one minute - Players are now 30% transparent ingame. Screenshots to be updated..
Put it in your maps ordner :D it is my first map :D

Ok my 6th map now.
First one thing...
To play this map you need a "fast" server.
You cannot play it on a "laptop server" etc. because it takes much resources.

And now some informations:
-More than 70Spawnpoints
-Background music (NeXuS - NeXuS Paradize)
-Skybox (train_hdr)

Description:
Each team spawns one one side of the map with no equip.
In the middle is a big hole and on each side are obliques.
Each team will spawn on one oblique.
Some time later, balls will spawn on each side in random intervals.
But they will spawn faster and faster.
In order to stay alive, you have to dodge the balls.
The team, who is alive when the other team is dead, will win and a new round will start.

Note: Google Translator ftw :D

Players must work as a team to keep the plate balanced.
But be aware of the random spawning boxes as they may put weight where you dont want it.
Be also aware that you now get scouts and a grenade!

STEAMGAMERS.COM | MiniGames | *Funtastic* @ 72.26.196.164:27015
MG_AZTEC_STRAFES ------------------------- NOW WITH 32 SPAWN POINTS! ------------------------- This map is all about strafing through holes in all different types of gravity settings. There are 32 Terrorist spawn points NOW! This also means that you can respawn if anything should happen or you join the game late! There are 10 levels including 2 bonus levels at the end that continue to get harder and harder the further you get! There is one secret at the start; you must find the hidden grenades and get them into the hole on the main start building above the swords! Some Servers settings: mp_limitteams 0 mp_flashlight 1 Map by [SG] Paul Thank You!

STEAMGAMERS.COM | MiniGames | *Funtastic* @ 72.26.196.164:27015
Map by [SG] Paul! This is a really really fun mao to play on with 20 + people for a few hours. This map is all about staying alive and getting out of the way of the falling blocks that get launched out of the middle. After a few minutes it will teleport you to a knife fight! 25 seconds before the knife fight, anything that falls to the ground teleports back to the top of the map! Enjoy. NOTE: This map is really big in terms of file size (55mb). Upload to your server if you want, but please dont complain about it as you have been warned. But I can gurantee this is a really really fun map!

New take on an old cs 1.6 classic. 1 team spawns with awps in the building and 1 with knifes in the submarine which launches them at the building. The sides randomly swap each round 50% chance to switch. A lot of fun simple and addicting. You can land directly through the window and live for fastest way inside if the server is not lagging. Enjoy

Set up for 64 spawns Please contact me before decompiling or using anything in here by messaging me here or finding me in game. My steam id would be Tomgreen STEAM_0:0:7598918 Please leave comments on the map so I know if you liked it in order to work on similar ideas ect..

Mg Awp Multigames
==================


MAP INFO
==================
There are 12 awp maps to play on, the player who gets to the teleport first, picks a map. 

There are 11 great awp maps to choose from, but if you pick random you have a chance to get the 12th bonus map. 

If a player either trolls or somehow noone manages to pick a map, the auto map chooser will pick a random map after 60 seconds.

This map will require the noblock plugin to work properly.

There are 64 player slots so it can easily go on any server.


CREDITS
==================
This map was made by me (DmgVol) but special thanks to Robb for testing/feedback/help.


Have fun!
---------

This is version of poorly-made map with a good idea - mg_awpknivez. Now I totally remade it without decompilation. Map idea is same - in the middle of the map is ring - place where Ts fight against CTs in a knife fight to the death. At each end of the map are elevated positions for leaders. Leaders have the AWP and shoot enemies in the ring. Death one of the team in the ring causes the death of leader and end of the round. The leader of one team can also kill the second leader. Between them is only a wall with small holes. **Contains:**
- a small pyramid on spawn, which selects leaders
- ring and 2 leadership position
- dividing wall with small holes
- HDR
- dev textures

Players spawn in random locations in the central area, however the two raised platforms are team specific. The aim of the players on platforms is to eliminate the players of the opposing team in the central or opposite platform on the map. Once all the players of a single team who spawn in the centre of the map have died, all the remaining players of that team will die. Therefore the central players can exterminate the entire opposing team just by killing the enemies in the centre.

Platform to platform attacks are also available, however due to the protecting glass, there are safe spaces at the corners of the platforms.

This map is a new version of the old map called mg_awpknifez (http://www.gamebanana.com/css/maps/154734).

The description of the map is very simple. There are 2 teams, that spawns with a AWP and a Knife, they need to kill each other, in the map is added places to hide (secret places to).

The difference on v1 and v2 of this map is the textures, Music in the map, many secret spots and smokegrenades with a nice colour added to it.

The map was created by and for Sox Clan.
www.soxclan.com

mg_avalanche
Map made by Eddie
Zip includes .bsp
To install extract the files in you server's maps folder.
-----------------------------------------------------------
The objective of the game is to avoid the objets that fall from sky.
Level 1 will start at second 5. Each 10 seconds difficulty level will be increased.
Max level 5. If you can survive 15 seconds at level 5, you will get a knife to kill enemies, but the avalanche never stops.
Maxplayers: 20

Total number of objets 41

The objets tha fall from sky are:
Color balls.
Spikes.
Boxes.
Rocks.
Cars.
Trucks.
Giant iPods

--------------------------------------------------------------------
///////////////////////////////////
///	Release Notes		///
///////////////////////////////////

--v1--
First version

The idea of this map is for the CT's to run across the map.
There are a couple of boxes in their way.
They can acces 2 hidden scouts.
At the end of the run there's an invisible teleport just before the pit.
This teleport will teleport them behind the T's where they can get a Glock or Usp.
When they have the guns they can kill the T's.
If done correct, CT's will win the round.
The T's have to shoot the CT's while they run trough the boxes.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Map by: Mr.Fishy
Idea by: Apex
Thanks to: 3kliksphilip, for your very helpfull tutorials.
Special thanks to: Valve, for releasing Source SDK.

Ok this is the fixed version of mg_attack_the_castle i didnt realize that there were so many bugs, so i took out the big boats cuz apparently they killed people :( and i took the grenades out cuz they didnt really help so i hope u enjoy this fixed version.

The Object of the game is to if your T drive your boat the the ct's castle and break down the doors to get to the bomb press the bomb to explode the castle.

Now if your ct u have to shoot down their boats with cannons(made by SolidSnake) to make sure they dont blow you up.

English:
So this is my second map.
The T team starts in a house. In front of the house is a gun that shoots at everything that comes in front of its event horizon.
The Ct team starts at the beginning of the road and under fire from the gun until it is turned off by them.
The T team, however, may not go before the gun as it will also fire at them.
The Ts can shoot out of the house on the CTs.
The target is to eliminate the opposing team.
In the map, there are many traps to get through the CT team make it even more difficult.
The CTs have shotguns, the Ts P90.

Deutsch:
Also das ist meine zweite Karte.
Die Ts beginnen in einem Haus. Vor dem Haus ist eine Kanone, die auf alles, was vor ihren Ereignishorizont kommt schießt.
Die CTs beginnen am Anfang der Straße und unter Beschuss aus Kanone, bis sie von ihnen ausgeschaltet wird.
Die Ts sollten sich jedoch nicht vor die Kanone begeben, sonst schießt diese auch auf sie.
Die Ts können aus dem Haus auf die CTs schießen.
Das Ziel ist es, das gegnerische Team zu eliminieren.
In der Karte gibt es viele Fallen, um es den CTs noch schwerer zu machen.
Die CTs haben Schrotflinten, die Ts P90.



PS: Sorry for my English (Google Translator :) )

so yeah hope u guys enjoy it

Map by Sander. Mini Game mod map. In map my Soundscape . Fixed map. Game ;D

###### **AUDIO SIZE NOW FIXED**

The screenshots in order are: Booster-knife, Breakbox, Cannon Surf, Knife, Shotguns, Speedclimb, Speedjumps, Trains, Arena, and AWP. 


Features
==================
12 songs:
- Beverly Hills Cop Theme
- Flying Underground by [LC] (Loudcore)
- Fire [AKA Levels 2] by Avicii
- He's a Pirate Remix by F-777
- Strength to Fight by NathanaelPlatier
- Power of Celtic by Lashmush
- Anxiety Attack by Stratkat
- Welcome to Metropolis by [LC] (Loudcore)
- Synesthesion by SasqualMox
- Popcorn [EON Remix] by Eon
- Wake Me Up [Instrumental] by Avicii
- Speed by Avicii

Textures
------------------

All 128x128 tiles. Check the shading out for yourselves, I personally think they look great.

### Start Room
- 64 Spawns, 32 for each team
- 8 different spawn obstacles to race for the selection
- Auto-selects a map if one hasn't been chosen 45 seconds after the teleporter to the selection area has been triggered.
- 14 different map selections

#### Map Size Info:
Download: 60.7 MB
Full Map Size: 138 MB

If it's too big for you, don't play it. Both SWAG and Creative multigames are larger maps. 

###### Dev Log

- Added a wall in breakbox to prevent players jumping to their death instantly
- [Hopefully] fixed fall damage filter only working on some players--not yet tested
- Fixed blinddeagle spawning bug
- Floor in breakbox disappears after 30 seconds to deter campers
- Added a small console message tutorial on disabling music
- Added my name to the map in a console message
- Made Speedjumps a certain win--you don't have to go back through the level to kill enemies.
- Fixed a double-song bug on finishing Sliderace
- Fixed knife only giving a knife to the person that pressed the button--not tested yet.
- Fixed USP not giving weapons to CTs
- Added two new spawn events
- Trains Floor now scrolls.
- Fixed hiding/camping spots in trains.
- Added a few more boards in trains.
- Speedjumps end sounds don't play every time you drop and pick up the gun anymore.
- New start teleport sound effects.
- Deleted a few start teleport sound effects that didn't work.
- Changed the sound played on selection buttons being pressed.
- Added Random.
- Added Awp [Small].
- Added Popcorn Remix by EON.
- Removed some of the end challenge audios. There are only four challenge maps anyway, and I had like 20 finish audios...
- Pressing the "Arena" part of the Arena selection picks a random of the weapons for the arena.
- Cannons in Cannon surf are disabled after five minutes.
- Changed the order of the Slide easy-makers, hopefully it will help noobs a bit.
- Added some lights to shotguns. It doesn't look too good, but it won't be as dark.
- Added a spray wall in the spawn room. It appears after someone wins the selection.
- The person who wins the selection gets sped up [I think it's 1.5x speed?] until the map is selected.
- Added an Arcanine decal in the spawn room.
- Players finishing challenges now get invisibility, as well as invisible weapons. If you switch to knife, however, your weapon is visible on your back. I don't think there's a fix for this :/
- Players finishing Sliderace and Bunnyhop now get knives.
- Added Arcanine decal in the start room.
- Added Wake Me Up [Instrumental] By Avicii.
- Players that did not finish the challenge maps get slowed down. [Half speed] This also adds a one-second delay for finishers on Bhop.
- There are now chat notifications for the "easymakers" in sliderace activations.
- Since making the finishing weapons invisible in sliderace makes all the M249s invisible, I added some neat glow effects on them so that you can find them. [Other than the one the winner gets]
- Added a backing to Speedjumps, with a few smoke grenades with sprites attatched to them. This adds several glass pieces in Speedjumps.
- Added an output to set the server timelimit to 40 minutes.
- Random now works 100% of the time
- Changed Iceskate--no more invisible ceiling, now has surf ramps and a leet where you can get a scout which turns off the iceskate.
- Gold checkered spawn no longer kills you if you fall.
- Lowered Trains cars' height a bit to make it easier to get back onto them.
- Spray Wall now scrolls
- Raised the Godlike roof on BoosterKnife
- Fixed trains camp-stopper hurting players between the first and second cars.
- Changed AWP selections to Snipers. You now get to chose between a scout and an awp for these selections.
- Added Backstab versions of Knife and Booster-knife
- Added a second version of shotguns
- Added a second version of breakbox. This also creates an interesting random game easter egg type thing.
- Added a headshot button for Arena
- Iceskate boosters now work and are slightly more powerful.
- Added Iceskate [Backstab]
- Changed the skybox to Icebergs by Komaokc
- Fixed Breakbox bug
- Fixed being able to see glass in speedjumps from shotguns bug
- Added another start room event
- Added a shotguns option for Cannon surf
- Changed some of the spawn room event textures so they're easier on the eyes
- Added another start room event
- Added sayings in the start room with lighting effects
- Added special thanks in the start room
- Added music credits in the start room
- Slightly increased the size of the sayings, and improved the lighting effects
- Added something to stop corner campers in knife backstab 
- Updated the music credits image
- Updated the special thanks image
- Fixed off texture on a platform in speedclimb
- Added a final thanks image
- Added speed by Avicii
- Added something to stop Sliderace being spammed. You can now only pick it once before having to choose random to get it. Speedclimb, Speedjumps, and Bunnyhop do NOT have this
- Updated Name wall
- Updated Special Thanks
- Updated iceskate so that you can't corner camp
- Speedclimb, Speedjumps, and Bunnyhop now have repeat-stoppers. Choosing random is now the only way to get them after the first time.
- Really fixed the error messages showing up when there were no errors
- Music in-map now registers as music in game and can be changed using options > music volume
- Deleted the mass of guns in start of breakbox in favor of game_player_equips+server lag
- Fixed broken repeat stoppers on Bunnyhop and Speedclimb
- Fixed broken grenade spawners in Cannon surf and Boosterknife [May have been causing a server crash problem]
- Aimed the initial boosters on Booster Knife slightly downwards to avoid cluster knifing at the start
- Fixed random getting breakbox bug where knives were not spawned
- Added a grenade in the middle of breakbox that appears when it's picked randomly
- Fixed another random breakbox knife bug
- Changed the positions of the sayings
- Changed the position of the name wall, special thanks, last thanks, and music credits to rotating, non-solid blocks.
- Changed the way the teleporters activate in an attempt to make it so the server doesn't crash when a ton of weapons are spawned at the same time.

<font face="times new roman"><FONT COLOR=#A9A9F5><font size="6"><center>MG_ARCS_MULTIGAMES</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF0040><font size="6">Arenas</font>
<FONT COLOR=#8000FF><font size="3">
- Pushcircle
- Bunnyhop Battle
- Defuse
- Snipers
- Knife (+Backstab)
- Shotguns (Boxes or Plus Signs)
- 1v1 (Deagle or Knife)
- Blinddeagle (Deagles or Elites)
- Boostknife (+Backstab)
- Arena (TMP, M4A1, Shotguns, Elites, Scouts, USPs +Headshot mode)
- CannonSurf (Knives or Shotguns)
- Iceskate (+Backstab)
- Buy
- Snipers [Small]
- Trains

</font>

<FONT COLOR=#0080FF><font size="6">Music</font>
<FONT COLOR=#00FFFF><font size="3">
- Ramses B - Visionary
- Sasqualmox - Synesthesion
- [EON] - Popcorn Remix
- Mannheim Steamroller - The Third Door
- Loudcore - Welcome to Metropolis
- NathanaelPlatier - Strength to Fight
- Avicii - Fire [Levels 2]
- F-777 - He's A Pirate Remixed
- Loudcore - Flying Underground
- Beverly Hills Cop Theme Song
- Avicii - Speed
- Lashmush - Power of Celtic
- Avicii - Wake Me Up

</font>

<font size="5"><FONT COLOR=#FF8000">
Pushcircle:
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">Plant the bomb, or bunnyhop around the circle and use the weapons you picked up or bought to kill the other team!</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Bunnyhop Battle: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">8 levels of bunnyhop. Increasing difficulty. The farther you get, the better your weapons and HP when teleported to the arena. If you pass the 8th level you get to kill everyone. One minute before teleportation to the arena.</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Defuse: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">A classic counter strike arena, except both teams get 1.5x speed. A buyzone at the spawns, and two bombsites.</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Snipers: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">A large sniper arena. Choose between AWP and Scout. Everyone gets 1.5x speed. Watch out for the crushing blocks!</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Knife: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">An arena where you get only knives. Backstab mode activates health regeneration. </font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Shotguns: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">An arena where you get shotguns and grenades. The different modes identify the cover/obstructions inside the arena.</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">1v1: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">Duke it out one-on-one with friends and enemies chosen at random from the players in the game.</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Blinddeagle: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">A breakaway from the classic Blind deagle maps, where there are buildings and doorways instead of just doorways. You can also choose to enter the same arena with dual elites. You get both pistols and grenades.</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Boostknife: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">An square arena with boosters on the mesa in the middle as well as boost paths around the outsides. Knives only; backstab mode activates health regeneration.</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Arena: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">Enter into a dark, cramped arena with any of the available weapons and a grenade. Headshot mode activates health regeneration. </font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">CannonSurf: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">Fly around to your heart's delight using the cannons while trying to either knife or shoot the enemies you find. </font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Iceskate: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">Launch off the entry ramp into an iceskate arena. Avoid the deadly pit in the center, it makes you extremely slow. Backstab mode activates health regeneration.</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Buy: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">A narrow arena with glass dividers down the center. You can shoot through the glass, but you only do half damage. Be careful of the bottom path!</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Snipers[Small]: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">A smaller arena for sniping. AWPs and Scouts are both available.</font>

<FONT COLOR=#FF8000">Trains: 
<FONT COLOR=#FFFF00"><font size="3">A recreation of the trains map. More space between trains, easier to get back onto the trains (kind of), and clear definition of where you are killed in the back. The trains are transporting some bizarre cargo.</font>




<FONT COLOR=#00FF00">Featuring a system of locking previously chosen arenas. Everything is is locked for three rounds except Arena, which is locked for one round. Random bypasses the locks. Huge thank you to Nyro for help with this idea. </font>

TekelaXII and the Darkergaming community would like to present: 

MG_ARCANE
=========

Being undiscovered for centuries, a group of scientists studying an area in the mountainous region discovered an ancient sanctuary located deep inside the mountain. Unfortunately for them, this discovery comes with a agonising hefty price.

The most detailed multigames map ever made with fair amount of optimization. Stunning detail and classic gameplay included! Out of 6 of the maps the are 8 variations of minigames including 1 unique minigame mode. High quality map-sound and textures along with lots of CS:GO and custom models made by Jimonions and Me! Custom textures are from hhh316 and Bartalon which materials
are defined with normal and specular.

Map is in Beta.

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/myyXPTsNbpE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

-----------------------------------------------------

Minigame List:
==============

- Ice Skate
- Long Jump
- Rope Jump
- Ak47 Deathmatch
- Shotgun Deathmatch
- 35HP Knife
- 100HP Knife

UNIQUE MINIGAME:
================
Objective
---------

This particulaar minigame are inspiration from Zombie Escape and Course map. Players has to do objectives which are accomplished faster with team-members help. Terrorist and Counter-terrorist has to race each other and go to the finish line as soon as possible.

Credits:
========

- TekelaXII: Mapping, Modelling, Texturing, Testing
- hhh316 (Deviantart): Many textures
- Bartalon (Deviantart): Gold coin textures
- Jimonions: Tree and Fern models
- Valve: Models, Texture
- Nexon: Soundtrack
- Intelligent System: Soundtrack

Notes: 105mb Map size!

A mini game map where you spawn in a fish tank and the water rises and you either have to finish off the enemy fast or eventually you will need to go up to the top for air where everyone is battling for a tiny room where they can breath. Built it in a day took a bit of time, its set up for 16v16 so larger mini game servers can run it to. There is a working water mine in the middle you can shoot it to make it blow up or you can shoot at the chain to make it rise up (sometimes into the room) then blow up any campers up there :) either way its fun to mess with. Prefab credit to Killo$ity for part of the chain used. Please comment and rate the map, so I know if I should release more of these abnormal maps in the future.

Thanks to Borixon for a custom texture and help.

**UPDATE**

20/12/2012: v3 is underway with 15 spawn points and 15 rooms!


Aperture Escape
-----------------

You and 5 other test subjects awake in a single room with a closed door. Before you know it, the door opens and you are forced to complete a series of tasks. Each task has one less exit than there are test subjects, meaning that one of you will perish each task from the deadly nerve gas that GLaDOS feeds into the rooms. Will you be the one to get the cake?



About the Map
--------------

I based this off an old Mario Party game, where there were 4 players and 3 doors. Each player had to find one of the three keys, leaving one without a passage to the next room.

Each room that you go through, one player will not be allowed to the next room and will die from the nerve gas that is released shortly after the next room opens. It's basically survival of the fittest. Beat your friends in desperate attempts to survive the next round.

Room 1 - Jumping Blocks
Room 2 - Laser Avoidance
Room 3 - Climbing Agility
Room 4 - Falling Floors
Room 5 - Intense Jumping Blocks

- Requires 6 players for maximum enjoyment.

- If hosting from your PC, use the following commands in the console to allow 6 people to play as terrorists:

mp_limitteams 6
mp_autoteambalance 0


- I don't recommend noblock as more than one person will be able to get through an exit.


Thanks to Reacz for his Portal 2 Texture Package - http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/2868

Also, thanks to the creators of the sprays I used as decals.
- Nucleus Studios
- TACOfarmerXD

All feedback and suggestions for future versions is much appreciated. I plan to make more player slots and rooms.

Thanks!
Bloodprime

Aperture Escape
-----------------

You and 5 other test subjects awake in a single room with a closed door. Before you know it, the door opens and you are forced to complete a series of tasks. Each task has one less exit than there are test subjects, meaning that one of you will perish each task from the deadly nerve gas that GLaDOS feeds into the rooms. Will you be the one to get the cake?



About the Map
--------------

I based this off an old Mario Party game, where there were 4 players and 3 doors. Each player had to find one of the three keys, leaving one without a passage to the next room.

Each room that you go through, one player will not be allowed to the next room and will die from the nerve gas that is released shortly after the next room opens. It's basically survival of the fittest. Beat your friends in desperate attempts to survive the next round.

Room 1 - Jumping Blocks
Room 2 - Laser Avoidance
Room 3 - Invisible Maze (Jump and Crouch)
Room 4 - Falling Floors
Room 5 - Intense Jumping Blocks

- Requires 6 players for maximum enjoyment.

- I don't recommend noblock as more than one person will be able to get through an exit.

Thanks to Reacz for his Portal 2 Texture Package - http://www.fpsbanana.com/textures/2868

All feedback and suggestions for future versions is much appreciated. I plan to add GLaDOS voices and hidden music in future versions. I will record the voices myself with an audio program if possible, this will make it more customized. I also plan to make more player slots and rooms.

Thanks!
Bloodprime

mg_anime_course!

A CSGO map i made some months ago now ported to cs:s

- 9 course levels + 3 bonus levels!
- Disco! to dance with your friends!
- Ecchi room
- Mini Map Radar

Recommended Settings:

its nice and funny to play with sv_autobunnyhopping 1 (in css maybe you want to have some plugins to do it) but you can finish the map with scroll bhop anyways.

the map will put these cvars ONLY at the first round, you can change its as you want in the next round and not will be changed.

- sv_enablebunnyhopping 1
- sv_airaccelerate 1000
- sv_staminajumpcost 0
- sv_staminalandcost 0
- mp_roundtime 40

this means you can download and play the map without put any settings!.


About the Disco: if you want to dance like me and my friends you need to install this plugin from sourcemod! [This is not working on cs:s i wish some day someone make a port so we can dance in cs:s

Info about the weight:

239MB this means if you will upload this map to a webhost (for fast download in a public server) remember to not compress the map to bz2 because the csgo/css limit is 150mb and your clients will not download the map.

About the CS:S Version:
this version has some small changes to adapt to cs: s.

This is a map I created for Counter Strike Source a while ago, and now i decided to upload it.

It is a Course-MiniGame map where your goal is to reach the end without dieing, and get eighter high or low gravity for all the next rounds. the winner is also given 1000 points.

The map was made for the HellFragger.no #09 MiniGame Server.

If you want to keep updated about my new bomb/defuse map for CS:GO be sure to check out my youtube channel for speedmappings etc. [http://www.youtube.com/aMasheep](http://www.youtube.com/aMasheep "http://www.youtube.com/aMasheep")

Thanks for your attention. -aM :)
